constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 107 (Monday, June 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 4023.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 17 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H2934]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

policyArea.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

title: District of Columbia Non-Discrimination Home Rule Act of 2021
